cn.inbot.padbotsdk.listener

Interface RobotListener


  • public interface RobotListener

    Robot Listener

    This interface monitors the information of the robot. By implementing and setting this listener, the methods in this interface will be invoked when the robot information updates.

    Author : Inbot
    Create Date : 2017/5/11
    JDK version used : JDK1.8
    Version : V3.0.0
    Copyright Â©2017 Inbot Technology Ltd. All rights reserved.
